title: Cointxz
author: Cointxz
content: Note: I will be making this thread a self moderated thread to make sure only valid post will be contribute here and not a general discussion for a recycle topic. The purpose of this thread is to know if this bonuses is really achievable or not in actual scenario.I know that this topic is already discussed but the old thread is very and I don't want to necro bump it. Recently I stumbled on some post regarding inquiring on this such bonus that I know it incorporates with very hard requirements.Is there someone really clear this bonuses especially those huge deposit bonus? Can you share your strategy on how you get it like bet size, game type or duration of your game to achieve this bonus completion.Post your screenshot if this is still available on your casino account bonus history.
